description: Try our easy to follow Oyster & Corn Chowder recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Oyster & Corn Chowder Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large potato, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook bacon in a large saucepan over medium heat until lightly browned. Add leek, celery, garlic and ginger and cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender.

Stir in flour and turmeric until blended and cook for 1 minute. Remove from the heat and gradually stir in milk and cream until smooth. Add potato and corn and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 1215 minutes or until potato is tender.
Remove oysters from shells, ensuring any small pieces of shell are discarded. Add oysters to pan. Simmer for 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and stir in chives to serve.
